verse.name: c1a
verse.lines:
There is joy, joy,
Joy in serving Jesus,
Joy that throbs
within my heart;

verse.name: c1b
verse.lines:
Ev'ry moment, ev'ry hour,
As I draw upon His power,
There is joy, joy,
Joy that never
shall depart.

verse.name: v1a
verse.lines:
There is joy
in serving Jesus,
As I journey on my way,

verse.name: v1b
verse.lines:
Joy that fills the heart
with praises,
Ev'ry hour and ev'ry day.

verse.name: v2a
verse.lines:
There is joy
in serving Jesus,
Joy that triumphs
over pain,

verse.name: v2b
verse.lines:
Fills my soul
with heaven's music,
Till I join
the glad refrain.

verse.name: v3a
verse.lines:
There is joy
in serving Jesus,
As I walk alone
with God.

verse.name: v3b
verse.lines:
'Tis the joy of Christ,
my Savior,
Who the path
of suffering trod.

verse.name: v4a
verse.lines:
There is joy
in serving Jesus,
Joy amid
the darkest night.

verse.name: v4b
verse.lines:
For I've learned
the wondrous secret,
And I'm walking
in the light.
